title: Cannabis Climax - The Connoisseur's Guide to Cannaphrodisiacs
description: Critics have often accused cannabis of being a gateway drug.Little did they know that it is in fact the gateway to staggeringly great sex and multiple whole-body orgasms.Demonised and denounced for almost a century, few people realise that cannabis has long been the most effective natural aphrodisiac ever discovered.Only now, as this magical plant finally regains some of its former status, are we finding out how valuable it really is in the bedroom.This book uncovers the plant's long history as a powerful agent of arousal, from ancient traditions of tantric sex, right up to the present day. More than just a medicine, a whole range of tinctures, oils and balms are now proving themselves to be true liberators of the modern libido.With her extensive personal experience, the author explains how cannabis benefits men, women and couples. She looks at the very latest methods of consumption and even how it improves sexual health.Most importantly of all, she explains clearly and concisely how cannabis offers the most explosive, mind-blowing orgasms that you have ever experienced.Read this book today, and your sex life will never be the same again.
author: Bianca Latimer
